## Pull Requests or Comits
Titles always we must use prefix according to below:

> ğŸ”¥ Feature, â™»ï¸ Refactor, ğŸ©¹ Fix, ğŸš¨ Test, ğŸ“š Doc, ğŸ¨ Style
- ğŸ”¥ Feature: Add flow to add person
- â™»ï¸ Refactor: Rename file X to Y
- ğŸ©¹ Fix: Improve flow
- ğŸš¨ Test: Validate to add a new person
- ğŸ“š Doc: Translate to Portuguese middleware redirect
- ğŸ¨ Style: Respected pattern Golint

All pull request that contains a feature or fix is mandatory to have unit tests. Your PR is only to be merged if you respect this flow.
